tutorial.speak:
Let's export your data from B1.church Admin. First, in the B1.church Admin dashboard, click on the settings icon.
Click on Import/Export in the settings menu.
Click the "Choose One" button to begin the export process.
Choose "B1.church Admin database" as your export option.
This will take you to Step 2 - Preview. Here you can review what will be exported.
Scroll to the bottom of the preview tab and click "Continue" to proceed.
You'll now be at Step 3 - Destination. This is where you choose how to export your data.
Click on "B1.church Admin Export Zip" to create a zip file of your data.
This takes you to Step 4 - Run. You'll see progress indicated with green check marks as the export processes.
When the export is complete, the zipped folder will automatically download to your downloads folder.
Find the "B1.church Admin Download" file in your downloads folder.
If the file isn't already unzipped, unzip it to access the contents.
Open the "people.csv" file. This contains your exported data, which you can now use with Excel or Numbers.
